website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for anyone looking for a base with a slight shimmer, though it's not ideal for crepey eyelids and some skin tones.
pros: This versatile, natural-looking formula earns praise for looking excellent by itself for most and for bonding with eyeshadow for reliable coverage and wear

cons: Shade is fairly light, and requires extra effort to blend on darker skin

customer_reviews.title: Did I just get an old bottle?

It also seems to make it difficult to get a good application with an eye pencil. The pencil doesn’t really get a smooth line, but instead it goes on rather light and smeary because of the oily base.
